page.title: 04Machines on the farm.
page.content: There are lots of mechanical devices used on farms these days which save farmers time and mean they don't need to employ so many people. Our farmer had: 1)Mower. 2)Machines for picking up grass and storing automatically. 3)An automatic sileage feeder. 4)Fertilizer spreader. 5)Milking machines. 6)Bulk tanks for the milk to go into. 7)Mechanical feeders. 8)Hedge cutters. 9)Tractor with a scraper to push manure out & put it into a spreader straight back onto the fields. 10)A slurry tanker which sucks up liquid manure & spreads it over the fields. This all means that farmers have to invest lots of money into new equipment
